topic.title: Appendix BAmendments to the Basis for Conclusions on other Standards

note.p: The amendments in this appendix to the Basis for Conclusions on other Standards are necessary in order to ensure consistency with IFRS 15 and the related amendments to other Standards.

p.i: The amendments contained in this appendix when IFRS 15 was issued in 2014 have been incorporated into the Basis for Conclusions on the relevant Standards included in this volume.
